what are we doing well? prompts for thin: Open source allows all people to contribute. Perfect spot between writing content and linking content in a database-like structure.
what could we do better? prompts for thi:
The initial learning curve for getting started is very steep. Thankfully there is Grok-TW.
One of my painpoints is synchronization with Android devices, which I haven't yet found a reasonable way to do.
